Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Per my voicemail, I wanted to send along some information about the 7-Eleven Fuel Card Program. I think you’ll find the Program an ideal solution for your business.
Whether you’re looking for robust fuel rebates, nationwide card acceptance, or tighter control over your company vehicles, a 7-Eleven Fuel Card is an extremely powerful tool in helping you manage your fleet fuel expenses with ease.
The Program's suite of online tools are designed to give you complete control over your fleet, including:
· Powerful Reporting. Know who bought what, when, where and for how much – available in hard copy and online.
· Broad Acceptance. Fuel and save at 7-Eleven regardless of the fuel brand at the pumps, plus enjoy card acceptance at 95% of all fueling locations nationwide.
· Purchase Controls. Help eliminate any misuse of company vehicles by setting purchase limits for each driver, with purchase alerts to keep you well informed.
· Live U.S.-based Customer Service. Award-winning customer assistance for you and your drivers 24/7.
I am including Program information and an application for your review. The application is the first step in getting set up with a 7-Eleven Fuel Card. Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have. I’ll also plan to follow up with you soon.
I hope we'll have the opportunity to serve your needs.
Many thanks,
John Saenz 7-Eleven Fuel Card Program - Regional Sales Manager 210.372.0346 Mobile 207.253.1343 Fax john.saenz@wexinc.com
